page.description: Centers a window in the client area.
page.discussion: The .WINDOW_POSITION() method positions a form or browse on the screen. The "fill" option allows you to fill the entire Alpha Anywhere client area, without having to maximize the window. By avoiding having to maximize the window, other windows can be opened in a smaller window on top of the window that fills the screen. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim frm as P frm = form.load("Form1") frm.window_position("300", "150") frm.show()
